rooms.description: Contemporary living area with open-plan kitchen integrated seamlessly into the design. Vastu-compliant orientation ensuring positive energy flow.
Modern kitchen space integrated with the living area; designed for functionality and convenience. South-east placement per Vastu guidelines.
Compact servant quarters allocated in a corner of the ground floor ensuring privacy and utility.
Cozy library designed with ample natural light; located to promote calm and study, adhering to Vastu principles for knowledge and wealth.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned in the south-west as per Vastu to invite positive energy.
Windows placed in the north-east for natural lighting and ventilation.
